## Defining a function

```{r, echo=TRUE}
func.name <- function(arg1) {
  # one or more expressions operating on fxn arguments
  # last expression is object returned
  # or use explicity `return()` 
} 
```

Example

```{r}
my.mean <- function(x) {
  sum(x)/length(x)
}
```
